nodes.text: Star Wars: The Force Awakens—The Official Visual Story Guide

Star Wars: The Force Awakens—The Official Visual Story Guide is a magazine companion to Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens that was released on March 20, 2016. The magazine retells the events of The Force Awakens through exclusive stills from the film, interviews with cast and crew members, and an exclusive look at the concept art for the film.

In spite of the Lucasfilm Story Group's announcement that licensed material published after April 25, 2014, should be deemed canon, Story Group creative executive Pablo Hidalgo has implied that this magazine is an exception. Furthermore, the magazine is not always internally consistent: page 64 states that Kylo Ren founded the Knights of Ren, while page 8 correctly[source?] states he joined the Knights.
